Fetal movement counting may tool mother might increase identification risk pregnancy . The outcome measure ( refer research question ) : 1 . Identification risk pregnancies/pathology ? 1 . Primary outcome measure : Numbers identify pathological condition pregnancy ( fetal growth restriction ( FGR ) , acute caesarean section fetal indication/non-reactive non-stress test ( NST ) , oligohydramnios , pathologic blood flow arteria umbilicalis , maternal perception absent fetal movement 24 hour admission hospital , perinatal death ) . 2 . Stimulate maternal-fetal attachment antepartum ? 1 . Primary outcome measure : Maternal-fetal attachment . 2 .
